sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Create Indexes for cmdb and cmdb_rel_ci</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[gs.log("Fix Script: Started executing the script for Create indexes for cmdb_ci and cmdb_rel_ci tables"); var indexCreator = new AddIndexesForCMDBTables(); indexCreator.createIndex('cmdb_ci', 'sys_updated_on, install_status', 'em_polling'); indexCreator.createIndex('cmdb_ci', 'sys_created_on', 'sys_created_on'); indexCreator.createIndex('cmdb_rel_ci', 'sys_created_on', 'sys_created_on'); gs.log("Fix Script: Finished executing the script for Create indexes for cmdb_ci and cmdb_rel_ci tables"); ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-12-14 01:28:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9603175777100110a69410ed9f5a999a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Create Indexes for cmdb and cmdb_rel_ci</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">8f64bce83c31311068bcf327dfe37f7e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9603175777100110a69410ed9f5a999a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-01-21 19:04:20</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Create Indexes for cmdb and cmdb_rel_ci
